survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from individuals who have recently received a vaccination to understand their experience, side effects, and overall satisfaction with the vaccination process.

questions.question_text: Which vaccine did you receive most recently?
questions.client_notes: Ensure all major vaccines are included. 'Other' option allows for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which vaccine did you receive most recently?

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall experience with the vaccination process?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall experience with the vaccination process?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any side effects after receiving the vaccine?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to filter for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Did you experience any side effects after receiving the vaccine?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the side effects you experienced.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to allow detailed responses. Mobile-friendly text input recommended.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the side effects you experienced.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How long did the side effects last?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Provides quantifiable data on side effect duration.

script.question_text: How long did the side effects last?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How convenient was the location where you received your vaccine?

script.question_text: How convenient was the location where you received your vaccine?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this vaccination site to others?

script.question_text: Would you recommend this vaccination site to others?

questions.question_text: Any additional comments or feedback about your vaccination experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture any unaddressed concerns or praises.

script.question_text: Any additional comments or feedback about your vaccination experience?
